inputs.name: speechDirectory
inputs.label: Base directory where speech files are located.

inputs.name: compareOutput
inputs.label: Base directory where compare output will be stored.

inputs.name: testSettings
inputs.label: Test settings for configuring NLU confusion matrix analysis.

inputs.name: publishTestResults
inputs.label: Signals whether to publish a test results tab.
inputs.helpMarkDown: Uses generated NUnit output from NLU.DevOps `compare` command to populate the test results tab. [Learn more about the `compare` command](https://github.com/microsoft/NLU.DevOps/blob/master/docs/Analyze.md).

inputs.name: publishNLUResults
inputs.label: Signals whether to publish an NLU results tab.
inputs.helpMarkDown: Uses generated JSON metadata output from NLU.DevOps `benchmark` command to populate the NLU results tab. [Learn more about the `benchmark` command](https://github.com/microsoft/NLU.DevOps/blob/master/docs/Analyze.md).

inputs.name: baselineBuildType
inputs.label: Specifies how to download the baseline build artifact. Options: latest, latestFromBranch, specific
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies how to download the baseline build artifact. Options: latest, latestFromBranch, specific

inputs.name: baselineBranchName
inputs.label: Specifies which branch to download the baseline build artifact. Required when baselineBuildType == latestFromBranch
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies which branch to download the baseline build artifact. Required when baselineBuildType == latestFromBranch

inputs.name: baselineBuildId
inputs.label: Specifies the specific build to download the baseline build artifact. Required when baselineBuildType == specific
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies the specific build to download the baseline build artifact. Required when baselineBuildType == specific

inputs.name: compareBuildCount
inputs.label: Number of previous builds to compare against in NLU results.
inputs.helpMarkDown: Number of previous builds to compare against in NLU results.

inputs.name: includePath
inputs.label: NLU.DevOps custom NLU provider include path.

inputs.name: workingDirectory
inputs.label: Working Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Current working directory where the script is run. Empty is the root of the repo (build) or artifacts (release), which is $(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory)

inputs.name: nupkgPath
inputs.label: Path containing .nupkg to use for installing dotnet-nlu
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path containing .nupkg to use for installing dotnet-nlu.

inputs.name: toolPath
inputs.label: .NET Core tool path to install dotnet-nlu.
inputs.helpMarkDown: .NET Core tool path to install dotnet-nlu.
